DOC.brief_title: Efficacy , Safety Efficiency Study CARTO® 3 System Guided THERMOCOOL® Catheter Ablation Versus Fluoroscopy Guided Ablation With Pulmonary Vein Ablation Catheter® ( PVAC® )
DOC.detailed_description: This study prospective , multi-center , randomize ( 2:1 ) , control , two-arm , unblinded , clinical study , evaluate efficacy , safety , efficiency CARTO® 3 System-guided RF ablation ( use THERMOCOOL® Catheter LASSO® Circular Mapping Catheter ) compare fluoroscopy-guided RF ablation ( use PVAC® ) . Patients symptomatic PAF meet inclusion criterion consider study participation may enrol exclusion criterion apply . Eligible subject sign study inform consent form randomize one two treatment group : - THERMOCOOL® Group : RF ablation achieve PVI use CARTO® 3 System , THERMOCOOL® Catheter LASSO® Circular Mapping Catheter - PVAC® Group : RF ablation achieve PVI use fluoroscopy PVAC®
DOC.criteria: Patients PAF two ( 2 ) symptomatic PAF episode six ( 6 ) month prior randomization , select catheter ablation treatment AF . Additionally patient recurrent AF episodes 30 day sinus rhythm maintain one week follow cardioversion require PVI treatment AF ( support consensus statement2 ) . At least one AF episode document either ECG , TTM , HM telemetry strip . Failure least one AAD PAF [ class I III ] evidence recurrent symptomatic PAF , intolerable side effect due AAD . Signed Patient Informed Consent Form . Age 18 year old . Able willing comply pre followup test requirement .
